text: The Riot Act is a 2018 American period thriller film. The film stars Brett Cullen, Connor Price, Brandon Keener, and Micah Hauptman. It is the debut feature film from writer-director Devon Parks. Principal photography finished in Arkansas in February 2018, and was released on September 14, 2018. ==References== == External links == * Category:2018 films Category:American films Category:American thriller films Category:2010s thriller films
title: The Riot Act (film)
